Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Franklinton -- 1% S&U Tax - M&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Franklinton, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $1,000,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of 10 years from October 1, 2021 through September 30, 2031, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services within the Town, all as defined by law, with the proceeds thereof (after paying necessary costs of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated as follows: (i) 40% for constructing, improving and maintaining streets and drainage facilities and improvements in the Town; (ii) 30% for supporting the Town's police department, including salaries, equipment and facilities therefor and related costs; (iii) 20% for supporting the Town's fire department, including salaries, equipment and facilities therefor and related costs; (iv) 5% for promoting the location and development of commerce and industry and supporting recreation in the Town, including related costs and (v) 5% for supporting the Town's facilities and facilities maintenance?
